content: Hoho~ Don't worry, Based on what I know about him, he's probably just stuck in place. I'll keep trying to reach him.
info: 墨尔斯来电_主流程文本

content:
Yeah, I hear you...
We're at the Camp,
You should be able to see us from anywhere around...

content:
When you have a moment, we should discuss our
"<color=#8AAB4B>Neighbor Affairs</color>."
Whether big or small, we'll address all matters of daily life together.

content: I arrived, but no one's here?! <size=64>Hey?! Mobai, can you hear me?</size>

content: Just like when we arrived, he might have encountered Maelstrom or lost his way in the mist...

content: How about calling everyone to the Camp while Sani is still around, so we can plan a trip to bring Mors back?

content:

But no worries, it won't be anything too dangerous, at most...

content: The Ecological Vitality Survey results are normal, but the mist is acting strangely, so I invited Mors to help out.

content: You can talk to him more about this. By now, he should be... {短暂停}Wait, why isn't he here yet? Sorry, let me give him a call. Please wait a moment!
